meanings.definition: The inner layer of skin in vertebrates, containing blood vessels, sweat glands, and nerve endings.
meanings.sent1: The coriums help regulate body temperature.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the coriums to understand skin health.
meanings.sent3: The coriums decided to throw a party for the sweat glands.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness ran deep, like the coriums of the skin.
meanings.sent5: The coriums are like a bustling city under the surface of the skin.
